home.title: Have your own <0>person space</0>, and use it however your want.
home.subtitle: Create an account to save and store everything you do on the site.

signUpModal.title: Sign up
signUpModal.subTitle: By registering, will be able to store your data.

success.title: Registered successfully!
success.description: Account created successfully, don't forget to login.

error.title: Error in registering!
error.description: Unfortunately there was an error in your registration, review your data and try again.

signInModal.title: Sign in
signInModal.subTitle: After registering, continue to access your account.

success.title: Logged in successfully!
success.description: Done! You have been successfully logged in, enjoy.

error.title: Login error!
error.description: Sorry, there was an error logging in, please try again.

auth.bySigningUp: By signing up, you agree to our

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again later
errors.emailAlreadyInUse: An account with this email already exists

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.signOutDescription: Sign out of your account on this device
profile.dragDropImage: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select
profile.uploadError: Failed to upload profile picture. Please try again.
profile.updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

pages.readyToExplore: Ready to explore your personal space? Access your saved data and continue where you left off.

notes.title: Notes
notes.noNotes: No notes yet. Create your first note!

expandedNote.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

notifications.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Note
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
deleteDialog.error: An error occurred while deleting the note

shareDialog.title: Share Note
shareDialog.successDescription: The note has been shared with {{displayName}}
shareDialog.error: An error occurred while sharing the note
shareDialog.cannotShareWithSelf: You cannot share a note with yourself
shareDialog.alreadyShared: You have already shared this note with this user

removeShareDialog.title: Remove Access to Shared Note
removeShareDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove your access to this shared note? You will no longer be able to view it.

hero.title: Have your own <0>personal space</0>, organized the way you want
hero.subtitle: Store your notes, manage your calendar, organize contacts, and keep everything in sync. All in one beautiful, secure place.

features.title: Everything you need, beautifully organized
features.subtitle: Personspace brings together all your personal information management needs in one cohesive, elegant platform.

notes.title: Smart Notes
notes.description: Create, organize, and share notes with powerful features. Color-code your thoughts and collaborate with others.

calendar.title: Calendar & Events
calendar.description: Keep track of important dates, events, and appointments. Never miss what matters most.

contacts.title: Contact Management
contacts.description: Store and organize all your contacts in one place. Access them whenever you need them.

schedule.title: Smart Scheduling
schedule.description: Plan your day, week, and month with intelligent scheduling tools that work for you.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share notes and collaborate with friends, family, or colleagues. Work together seamlessly.

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your data is encrypted and secure. We take your privacy seriously and never share your information.

cta.title: Ready to get organized?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have already organized their personal space. Start today.

about.title: About Personspace
about.description1: Personspace is your all-in-one personal organization platform. We believe everyone deserves a beautiful, secure place to store their important information.
about.description2: Whether you're taking notes, managing your calendar, organizing contacts, or planning your schedule, Personspace makes it simple and elegant.
about.description3: Built with modern web technologies and designed with privacy in mind, Personspace gives you complete control over your personal data.

footer.tagline: Your personal space, organized the way you want.
